### Code Demonstration

```python
# More complex example
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def visualize_concept():
    """Visualize the concept being taught."""
    x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
    y = np.sin(x)

    plt.figure(figsize=(8, 4))
    plt.plot(x, y, label='Sine wave', color='#1a5f7a', linewidth=2)
    plt.xlabel('X-axis')
    plt.ylabel('Y-axis')
    plt.title('Example Visualization')
    plt.legend()
    plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
    plt.show()

visualize_concept()
```
